channel.name: Newsmax US
channel.title: The 80s: Decade of Decision
channel.desc: Greed was good during the decadent 80s, and so were big hair, big shoulders, and even bigger 401ks; the 80s was the era of Reaganomics, Rubik's Cube, Madonna, Rambo, the Macintosh, Mario Brothers, Chernobyl, flying DeLoreans, and so much more.
